chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin M. Christopher was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Causing Mental Harm to Child, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.04(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin M. Christopher
Current: 5380 Classic Ln, Platteville, WI 53818 United States  (Effective: 09-21-2017)
Prior: 715 County Road E, Livingston, WI 53554 United States
Judgment for Unpaid Fines, Forfeitures and Other Financial Obligations - Not Deliverable As Addressed, Unable to Forward - Different address listed on another county case, Attempting to resend

Defendant Justin M. Christopher in court, in custody, with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  DOC Agent Flannery appeared by phone; was the PSI author.  Argued sentencing.  PSI reviewed.  State motions for information on def's juv. record if such exists.  Court grants the motion and requests assistance from Grant County to DA for that matter.  Atty. M questions confidentiality of those records; did not anticipate these questions today by the State.  Court will review that matter and draft an order; states that juvenile records are confidential to the public but not to the Court or counsel in this matter.  

DA motions for addendum to PSI in recognition that there is a juvenile record.  So ordered.

Atty. M requests that anything that ends up in the court record pertaining to juvenile records be sealed.  Court so orders.

Court sentences def to 12 months jail - that sentence is stayed for probation of 5 years.  Undergo sexual offender assessment; attend, pay for, and successfully complete any educational programs or training ordered by the agent; Court orders that def follow through with any recommendations of the s.o. evaluator; no contact with victim or victim's mother and father; pay costs as a condition; 156 days credit, by stipulation, in the event of revocation; huber in the event of revocation.

Felony admonishments provided.
Sentencing hearing on August 5, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Justin M. Christopher in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Information filed with amendment to Count 1. Formal reading waived. Court states charge and informs def of the possible max penalties as well as his rights. Def pleads no contest. Court's colloquy on plea. Finding of guilty. PSI ordered. Sentencing set for 8/5 at 9.  PSI due 7/29 - author to be present or available by phone.
Arraignment on June 3, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Justin M. Christopher in court, in custody, with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Matter was set for prelim today.  Counsel advise the Court that the def is waiving his right to prelim; wants to proceed to arraignment.  Arraignment set for 6/3 at 10.  Arraignment scheduled for June 3, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 22, 2016 at 01:45 pm.
Def from R Co Jail

Defendant Justin M. Christopher appeared by video means from the Richland County Jail. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Justin M. Christopher.  Atty. M asks for modification of def's bail; requests signature bond.  DA argues against the request.  Court denies the request to modify bond.  Atty. M - Defense requests prelim within 10 days.  Court sets 4/22 at 1:45.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 22, 2016 at 01:45 pm.

Bail modification hearing.  Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Justin M. Christopher. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Justin M. Christopher appeared by video means from the Richland County Jail where he is in custody.  Bail was previously set for 5k cash; defense is requesting modification.  Atty. McDougal addresses the Court; asks for signature bond.  DA addresses the Court; requests bond to remain as set.  Court reduces bond to 1k cash - no changes in non-monetary conditions.  Atty. M asks for further adjourned initial appearance; waives time limits for prelim.  Court's colloquy with def re time limits waiver.  Court sets 4/15 at 10.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 15, 2016 at 10:00 am.

DA Jennifer Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Atty Lisa McDougal appeared via phone for defendant Justin Christopher. Defendant appeared in person, in custody. Atty LM asks for current signature bond be reinstated.  Court orders $5,000 cash bond w/conditions that no contact be made with victim or any person under 17 years of age except for school, work or religious events.  Adjourned initial set for March 17th at 11AM.
